message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to the table.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13500. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.

I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering it to you for $17000. This is my final counteroffer.
I'm afraid $17000 is still not within my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to stay at $13500. I'm not willing to go any higher. This is my final offer.
